html: Only after many years have elapsed during the millennial age does world trade make a comeback. This time, however, disbursements of products are based not on greed but on merit, such as providing for servants of Jehovah who dwell in his presence: “You shall be called the priests of Jehovah and referred to as the ministers of our God. You shall feed on the wealth of the nations and be gratified with their choicest provision” (Isaiah 61:6). Using the imagery of a former harlot whom people make the subject of derisive folksongs, Isaiah predicts Tyre’s return but also recalls her to mind as a warning.
